problem.p: A projectile is launched horizontally from a certain height over a flat terrain. The horizontal range of the projectile equals the height from which the projectile is launched. Neglect resistive forces.
Consider the angle \(\theta\) that the landing velocity vector makes with the ground. What statement about angle \(\theta\) is correct?
Which of the following statements about \(\theta\) is correct?

choicegroup.choice: The information given in the problem is sufficient to calculate \(\theta\)
Knowing the initial height only is sufficient to calculate \(\theta\)
Knowing the acceleration due to gravity only is sufficient to calculate \(\theta\)
Knowing both the initial height and the acceleration due to gravity is necessary to calculate \(\theta\)
